name: CASE_RATE
description: This table contains information about case rate and dental treatment plan.

columns.name: CASE_RATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for a case rate record.

columns.name: ACTIVE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the case is active.  Y indicates the case is active.  There will be no null value for this column.

columns.name: CASE_RATE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value representing the type of transplant for the case rate.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The guarantor account ID associated with this case rate.

columns.name: FROM_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The first service date in the inclusion period for the case rate procedures.

columns.name: T0_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The last service date in the inclusion period for the case rate procedures.

columns.name: BATCH_PRC_FLAG_C_NAME
columns.description: A flag that indicates the charging status of the case rate record. This flag can be set to indicate that the holding period is complete, the inclusion period is complete, or neither is complete.
